short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly list and count all pages of any website in a single click. Built for SEO and web developers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension to quickly count all pages of any website in a single click.

Features:
- Crawl sitemaps to get the list of all pages of any website;
- Download list of all pages in a single clicks.

Click → Count → Download

It's that simple ✨

Built for SEO, by SEO
